title: Swiss pork and beef meatballs
ingredients: ['2 slices bread, preferably a few days old', '3 fennel seeds (optional)', '1 teaspoon dried tarragon', '200g lean steak mince', '200g pork mince', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon redcurrant jelly', '1 pinch ground allspice', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 onion, very finely diced', '1 teaspoon Dijon or grainy mustard', 'olive or vegetable oil for pan frying']
